benchmark_details.name: PsOCR (Pashto Optical Character Recognition)
benchmark_details.overview: This paper evaluates the performance of Large Multimodal Models (LMMs) on Optical Character Recognition (OCR) in the low-resource Pashto language by introducing a dataset comprising one million synthetic images annotated at various levels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To develop a comprehensive dataset for training and evaluating LMMs on Pashto OCR tasks.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset consists solely of computer-generated text and does not include handwritten samples.

data.source: Synthetic generation methods using a curated text corpus collected from various sources including Common Crawl, open-source websites, and previous studies.
data.annotation: Annotated at word, line, and document levels with bounding boxes.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the character and word transformation needed to match predicted text with ground-truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better OCR performance on the synthetic images.
methodology.validation: No pre-training or fine-tuning applied; models evaluated in their original form.
